public final class UIUtil
extends java.lang.Object

Contains utility methods useful for GUI components.

getIntegerFormatter

public static javax.swing.text.NumberFormatter getIntegerFormatter(int maxIntegerDigits)
Constructs then returns a formatter instance can be used with formatted text fields which accepts integer values.

Parameters:
maxIntegerDigits - maximum digits allowed in number integer part.
Returns:
a number formatter.

getWindowCentralizedLocation

public static java.awt.Point getWindowCentralizedLocation(java.awt.Window window)
Calculates the point where window will resides at the center of screen.

Calculation depends on screen size and insets and window width and height.

Parameters:
window - window for which to calculate its centralized location.
Returns:
the point which puts the window in a center centralized screen.

getMaximumVisibleWindowSize

public static java.awt.Dimension getMaximumVisibleWindowSize(java.awt.Window window)
Calculates the maximum size to display window in.

The calculation depends on screen size and insets to get the most visible width and height to display window in.

Parameters:
window - window to which calculates maximum visible size.
Returns:
maximum visible size allowed to display the window in.

handleActionFailure

public static void handleActionFailure(java.awt.Component component,
                                       java.lang.Exception exception)
Utility to handle exceptions thrown by UI actions by logging it and showing error dialog for it.

Parameters:
component - parent component to view error dialog in.
exception - exception thrown.

reportInternalFailure

public static void reportInternalFailure(java.lang.Throwable throwable)
Utility to handle internal failures occurred while working on program UI.

Parameters:
throwable - cause of failure.
